resources.string: Congratulations! You\'ve set a new high score!

string-array.name: actuality
string-array.item: Solving Sudoku has been proven to rejuvenate the brain and slow down cell aging.
Sudoku develops memory, logical thinking, helps with concentration and fights the threat of dementia.
If you solve 1 Sudoku a day, it will take you about 19 million years, taking into account the number of unique Sudokus.
Sudoku is one of the top ten non-traditional and alternative ways to increase brain power.
Sudoku is a game for thinking people. If you choose Sudoku every day, patience, attention, memory, logical thinking develop.
The Japanese team is the leader in victories in the international sudoku solving tournament. The second most victorious team from Germany.
Until recently, the world record for solving Sudoku belonged to the Belgian Vincent Bertrand. His time was 3 minutes 6 seconds.
It is absolutely impossible to play Sudoku quickly. Here, the acquired information must be sorted out, memorized, reflected, and made assumptions.
By choosing the difficulty level, you influence the initial conditions of the game. The higher the difficulty, the fewer cells are filled with numbers from 1 to 9.

resources.string: Copyright © 2023 Renat Mussayev. All rights reserved.
Are you sure you want to exit?
Do you really want to quit the game?
If you enjoy using our app, please take a moment to rate it on the Google Play Store.

Expert mode is a mode for experienced players who want to increase their rating. The game in this mode is played without pauses, hints, and without the ability to save progress. To participate in ranked games and increase your rating, you need to log in.
Sudoku is a logic puzzle that consists of a 9x9 grid, divided into 9 3x3 squares. Some cells of the grid are already filled with numbers, while the other cells must be filled in by the player.
The goal of the game is to fill all the cells of the grid with numbers from 1 to 9, so that each digit appears only once in every row, every column, and every 3x3 square.
To start the game, select a cell that you want to fill in and tap on it. The selected cell will be highlighted.
Next, select a number that you want to insert into the selected cell and tap on the button with that number on the toolbar at the bottom of the screen.
If the number you selected violates the rules of the game (for example, if it\'s already present in the same row, column, or 3x3 square), it will be highlighted in red.
If the number you selected does not violate the rules of the game, it will be placed in the selected cell.
Continue filling in the cells until you have filled in all the cells of the grid.
If you get stuck and don\'t know what number to insert into a cell, you can tap on the "Hint" button on the toolbar to get a hint for the selected cell.
If you fill in all the cells correctly, congratulations, you have won the game!
Sorry, but you have used all your hints.
If you want to play without limitations and without worrying about the number of errors, you can disable this feature. Enjoy your game!

Guys, your feedback is very important to me as it motivates me to improve the game every day. Please leave a review on Google Play, it will help me understand what can be enhanced and what has already been done well. Thank you for your support and your suggestions!
